titles.title: Praise the LORD who reigns above

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise the Lord who reigns above and keeps His courts below; praise the holy God of love, and all His greatness show. Praise Him for His noble deeds, praise Him for His matchless pow'r; Him from whom all good proceeds let earth and heaven adore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Celebrate th'eternal God with harp and psaltery; timbrels soft and cymbals loud in His high praise agree. Praise Him, ev'ry tuneful string; all the reach of heav'nly art, all the pow'rs of music bring, the music of the heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Him, in whom they move and live, let ev'ry creature sing, glory to their Maker give, and homage to their King. Hallowed be His name beneath, as in heav'n, on earth adored; praise the Lord in ev'ry breath, let all things praise the LORD!
